import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { loginUser } from "../services/internalApiService" const Login = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState([]) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let returningUser = { username, password } loginUser(returningUser) .then(data => { if(data.user){ localStorage.setItem('token', data.user) navigate("/") } }) .catch(err => { const errRes = err.response.data.error.message setError(errRes) }) } return ( <>
